comments:
I had imported org.eclipse.ui into my image using the PDE plug-in importer. 
When I went to load org.eclipse.ui from the repository I was asked if I wished 
to replace the one I had and then I got the following error.

Tod, I assume you had a breakpoint on one of the org.eclipse.ui classes?

The following steps

  1. have org.eclipse.ui as binary
  2. "Checkout as Project" org.eclipse.ui

lead to a different walkback:

Judging that the exception was in a marker I would say almost for certain - I 
don't use bookmarks.

I tried with our latest code (with Mike's pre-existing fix for my walkback) and 
was unable to reproduce Tod's by setting a breakpoint on class being replaced.
